90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Anshuman,
Hope you are doing well. I just wanted to follow up on our call, are you planning on using MBO Partners? Please let me know if you have any additional questions for me.
Thank you, Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners

From: Sara Conde Sent: Monday, January 16, 2012 12:42 PM To: 'anshumanpurohit@gmail.com' Subject: RE: MBO Call Follow Up
Hi Anshuman,
So nice speaking with you again. Attached is the updated financial snapshot. Please let me know if you would like to see the numbers run differently.
Thanks!
___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners

From: Sara Conde Sent: Monday, January 16, 2012 11:17 AM To: 'anshumanpurohit@gmail.com' Subject: MBO Call Follow Up
Dear Anshuman,
It was a pleasure speaking with you. You’ll find everything that I referenced on our call by going here. I also have attached the estimate and sample certificate of insurace as requested.
We are also promoting our new meet the independents project and are taking applications if you would like to be featured. You can view the program by going here.
I will follow up with you later on today.
as promised, should you have questions before then, please schedule a convenient time using my online schedule.
Best regards, Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
